name: Brothers In Arms 2: Global Front
description:
Brothers In Arms 2: Global Front is an action-shooter game developed by Gameloft. It came out on 21-02-2010. Gameloft published the game. Brothers In Arms 2: Global Front has a Metascore of 83, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Brothers In Arms 2: Global Front on iOS and Android.
